Quæstio quodlibetica, or, A discourse whether it may bee lawfull to take use for money Filmer, Robert, Sir, d. 1653. Twysden, Roger, Sir, 1597-1672.
[41], 149, [1] p.
Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1653.
An examination of Dr. Fenton's treatise on usury. "To the reader" signed: Roger Twisden; preface signed: R.F. Written by R.F. [i.e., R. Filmer?]; edited by R. Twysden. Cf. BM. Errata: p. [41]. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library. Includes bibliographical references.
=======

[41], 149, [1] p.
Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1653.
An examination of Dr. Fenton's treatise on usury. "To the reader" signed: Roger Twisden; preface signed: R.F. Written by R.F. [i.e., R. Filmer?]; edited by R. Twysden. Cf. BM. Errata: p. [41]. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library. Includes bibliographical references.
